Create bed files from fragments split by cell group.

Source: R/atac_utils.R
write_insertion_bed.Rd

Create bed files from fragments split by cell group.

Usage

write_insertion_bed(
  fragments,
  path,
  cell_groups = rlang::rep_along(cellNames(fragments), "all"),
  insertion_mode = c("both", "start_only", "end_only"),
  verbose = FALSE,
  threads = 1
)

Arguments

fragments

IterableFragments object

path

(character vector) Path to save bed files. If cell_groups is provided, this must be a character vector with one name for each level in cell_groups Else, this must be a character vector of length 1.

cell_groups

(character vector or factor) Cluster assignments for each cell.

insertion_mode

(string) Which fragment ends to use for coverage calculation. One of "both", "start_only", or "end_only"

verbose

(bool) Whether to provide verbose progress output to console.

threads

(int) Number of threads to use.

Value

NULL

On this page
